ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Rejected value for 'userAgentTemplate'
ygData.msgSnippet: ... All right...I think we got it. This property is a template, which indeed has to have the @OPERATOR_CONTACT_URL@ placeholder. To get the desired effect,

X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=114442761; y=fnFoLE6tH99XxvsdV7Lr6AYV2VZAeuIm09njmNRbiQ6qwTCC
X-Yahoo-Profile: iodinebay

On 11/04/2010 04:28 PM, Mahmoud Mubarak wrote:
> I'm using Heritrix Engine 3.1.1-SNAPSHOT-20100915.040035. When I wrote
> user agent value as follow:
> <property name="userAgentTemplate"
> value="Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; archive.bibalex.org_bot
> +http://archive.bibalex.org/bot)"/>

All right...I think we got it. This property is a "template," which 
indeed has to have the @OPERATOR_CONTACT_URL@ placeholder. To get the 
desired effect, set the userAgentTemplate like this:

<property name="userAgentTemplate" value="Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; 
archive.bibalex.org_bot; +@OPERATOR_CONTACT_URL@)"/>

And set metadata.operatorContactUrl earlier on in the XML (under 
id="simpleOverrides") like this:

metadata.operatorContactUrl=http://archive.bibalex.org/bot

Thanks to Mohamed Elsayed <mohammed.elsayyed@...> for figuring 
this out.

Youssef Eldakar
Bibliotheca Alexandrina
